properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
F/V EL HASAN 2, BLUE HULL, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN VICINITY
33-30N 015-15E ON 05 JUL. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2182 1444 6799, 2182 1563 1578,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868, 2182 1444 6799,
E-MAIL: SAR@ANS.CAA.GOV.LY, SALEM.ELKABIR@CAA.GOV.LY
OR MRCC LIBYA, PHONE: 2182 1444 9488,
FAX: 2182 1444 9149, 2182 1444 9274,
E-MAIL: LCG.NAV.ROOM@GMAIL.COM, NHA@LTTNET.NET OR
LIBYAN NAVY COAST GUARD, PHONE: 2182 1444 9488,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
E-MAIL: LIBYAN.NAVAL.COMMS.CENTRE@GMAIL.COM OR
MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
